select li.id, li.order_id, li.remark, li.create_date, oi.code , oi.total_cost, ui.name, ui.phone, ui.address AS userAddress from logistics_info li left join order_info oi on (oi.id = li.order_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) where 1 = 1 and li.current_logistics = 1
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{logisticsInfo.orderCode},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{logisticsInfo.userName},'%')
order by oi.create_date desc
